mapper.select: select i.content_id, i.title, i.addr1, i.first_image, i.content_type_id, i.latitude, i.longitude, d.overview from attraction_info i join attraction_description d on i.content_id = d.content_id where i.content_id = #{i.contentId}

select a.content_id, a.title, a.addr1, a.first_image from attraction_info a join ( select content_id, count(*) as `count` from review group by content_id order by count(*) desc limit 10) r on a.content_id = r.content_id;
